name: Pressure Adaptation
components: V, S, M (slime from a cephalopod)
text: The target adapts incredibly quickly to changes in pressure, adjusting to 100 feet of new pressure (or the entire shift, in the case of an instantaneous shift within its native range; see page 48) after just one successful Fortitude saving throw instead of the usual five.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势，材料（软体动物的粘液）
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 目标会在短到不可思议的时间内适应压力的变化，只需要一次强韧豁免而不是通常的五次就能适应100尺压力（或者直接适应整个压力变化过程，只要这次过程在目标的天生潜水范围之内; 参见48页）。
